dialog: Oh, it’s been a while since I’ve last you guys.
I knew you guys quit with your resignation letters talking about
something about following your dreams???
Is that what they're called?
But I didn't think it'd be for this run down gig.
Anyways, get your old manager a poke bowl
What's taking so long? I have a meeting in 10.
If you guys don't hurry it up,
I won't be the only one swimming with the fishes.
I'm sorry that sounded more ominous than intended.
Thanks.
The office misses you guys by the way.
I'll send them your way for lunch breaks
Keep the change and good luck.
In this economy, you'll need it.
Hey so I have to go.
The office misses you guys by the way.
I'll send them your way for lunch breaks
Good luck.
In this economy, you'll need it.
Y'all serve flies here?
No?
Oh.... Dang.
Well, how about a salmon roll?
Y'all better hop to it or I will.
Mmmm!
Thanks!
Hmph. Disappointing.
So like, I'm lactose intolerant.
So like, do you guys have anything that's like uh
Organic, vegan, gluten free, and cruelty free?
but also like... actually tastes good and savory?
Oh sweet you do!?
Then I'll take that organic poke bowl
with extra gluten and cruelty-free sesame seeds!
If this takes any longer, I'll write an extremely long callout blog post on this establishment.
Thanks!
This will totally fit my food account Instagram feed!!
Wack out of 5 stars. Honestly.
Hay.
Lemme get uhhhhh...
Uhhhhhhhhhh...
No, I don't need a minute to look at the menu!
I got it...
I swear...
Uh...
I'll take an order of sashimi please.
Hurry up, I don't have all day...
Thaaaaanks
It looks delicious!
Hello sir!
My mom tells me I can eat anything I want for lunch
...as long as I can get it to fit in my mouth!
So gimme 1 order of salmon sushi rolls please! Just don’t make ‘em too big!
Hey can you guys please hurry? I have baseball practice soon.
Salmon?
I know I asked for it, but thanks! My favorite!
Sorry, but I have to go to practice now...
